note.p: Birth: Clay Hill, near Beckenham, Kent, England (17 November 1794)
Burial: The corner of the south transept and aisle, Westminster Abbey, London
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1871-1872 vol 20 pp iii-xi signed by A B
References: W Johnson, 'Edward Gibbon and George Grote: A Bicentenary in Common' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 221-226, plate
